metrics.name: Automation rate for invoice clearing
metrics.description: Percentage of automated invoice clearing events. For example 'Clear Invoice' events that are not performed by a Dialog user

metrics.name: Invoices with immediate payment terms
metrics.description: Number of invoices where the payment terms (BSEG.ZBD1T) are 0 or NULL
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") FILTER(
	WHERE ${itp_cash_discount_terms} IS NULL
		OR ${itp_cash_discount_terms} = 0)

metrics.name: Payment Terms Differences where PO is better (Median)
metrics.description: Number of invoices for which the payment terms on the invoice differ from the payment terms on the purchase order
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG("PO Cash Discount Days 1"-"Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1") FILTER(
	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
		< (CASE WHEN "PO Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL THEN 0 
	ELSE "PO Cash Discount Days 1" END))

metrics.name: Payment Terms Differences where PO is better (Amount)
metrics.description: Number of invoices for which the payment terms on the invoice differ from the payment terms on the purchase order
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD") FILTER(
	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1") 
		< (CASE WHEN "PO Cash Discount Days 1" IS NULL THEN 0 
	ELSE "PO Cash Discount Days 1" END))

metrics.name: WC Impact of Invoices with immediate payment terms
metrics.description: Amount of invoices where the payment terms (BSEG.ZBD1T) are 0 or NULL
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD") FILTER(
	WHERE ${itp_cash_discount_terms} IS NULL
		OR ${itp_cash_discount_terms} = 0) *15*0.04/365

metrics.name: Percentage of baseline date changes
metrics.description: Percentage of Baseline Date Changes after the Invoice was posted to SAP
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${itc_change_baseline_date})
		AND event_name MATCHES(${itc_posting_to_baseline_update_events}))
/
COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Percentage of reversed invoices
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were reversed
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${itc_invoice_reversal_events}))
/
COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Number of open overdue invoices
metrics.description: Number of invoices that are currently open and overdue
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${itc_clearing_date} IS NULL)
		AND ${itc_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
)

metrics.name: Total overdue invoice amounts
metrics.description: Sum of all invoice amounts that are overdue (converted in USD)
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(${itc_amount_conv}) FILTER(
	 WHERE (${itc_clearing_date} IS NULL)
		AND ${itc_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
	)

metrics.name: On-time payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared less than 5 days before and no later than 1 day after their due dates

metrics.name: No-Touch invoice processing rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices with no change events
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES(${itc_no_touch_condition})) 
		AND (event_name MATCHES(${itc_clear_invoice_events}))
)
/ (COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${itc_clear_invoice_events}))
	)
* 100

metrics.name: Average time post goods issue to invoice creation
metrics.description: Average time from posting goods issue to invoice creation
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) 
	WHERE event_name IN (${itc_invoice_creation_events})) 
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	WHERE event_name IN (${itc_shipping_events}))
)

metrics.name: Late payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared 1 day after their due dates

metrics.name: No payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of overdue invoices from all open invoices
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${itc_clearing_date} IS NULL AND ${itc_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
	)
/ COUNT (case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE (${itc_clearing_date} IS NULL)) * 100

metrics.name: Dunning rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were dunned

metrics.name: Duration of dunning blocks
metrics.description: Average lead time from setting a dunning block to removing the last dunning block
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER 
		(WHERE event_name IN (${itc_remove_dunning_block_events})))
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER
		(WHERE event_name IN (${itc_set_dunning_block_events})))
)

metrics.name: Invoices without billing doc from SO
metrics.description: Invoices without Billing Document from Sales Order

metrics.name: Automation rate for invoice clearing
metrics.description: Percentage of automated invoice clearing events

metrics.name: Average cycle time for cases affected by rework
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event for cases affected by rework

metrics.name: PTP_DB_Average Cycle Time from Create FI Invoice to Clear Invoice
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Clear Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create FI Invoice'))
   )
)

metrics.name: PTP_DB_Average Cycle Time from Goods Receipt to Create FI Invoice
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create FI Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Goods Receipt'))
   )
)

metrics.name: PTP_DB_Average Cycle Time from PO Released to Goods Receipt
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create Goods Receipt'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Release PO'))
   )
)

metrics.name: PTP_DB_Average Cycle Time from PO Creation to PO Release
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Release PO'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create PO Item'))
   )
)

metrics.name: PTP_DB_Maverick Buying Rate
metrics.description: The rate of purchase orders, that have been created after the invoice
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES('Create FI Invoice' 
    	~> 'Create PO Item')
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Automation Rate Over Events
metrics.signalFragment:
count(event_name) FILTER 
(WHERE "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')) 
/ count(event_name) * 100

metrics.name: PTP_DB_Number of open overdue invoices
metrics.description: Number of invoices that are currently open and overdue
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(DISTINCT "FI Invoice ID") FILTER (
	WHERE (${itp_clearing_date} IS NULL)
		AND ${itp_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))

metrics.name: Ratio of overdue invoices
metrics.description: Percentage of overdue invoices from all open invoices
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${itp_clearing_date} IS NULL AND ${itp_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
	)
/ COUNT (case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE (${itp_clearing_date} IS NULL)) * 100

metrics.name: Total overdue invoice amounts
metrics.description: Sum of all invoice amounts that are open and overdue (converted to USD)
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(${itp_amount_conv}) FILTER(
	 WHERE (${itp_clearing_date} IS NULL)
		AND ${itp_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))

metrics.name: Number of cases with PO changes
metrics.description: Number of cases with PO changes
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name ${po_change_event_flow})))

metrics.name: Total number of cases with changes
metrics.description: Total number of cases with change events
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name ${change_events})))

metrics.name: PO Item changes rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with PO Item changes
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${po_change_event_flow})))
	/
	COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${po_creation_events}))
	)
	* 100
    
    -- ILIKE '%Update%'

metrics.name: Percent of cases affected by rework
metrics.description: Number of cases affected by rework divided by the total number of cases

metrics.name: Late deliveries net value
metrics.description: Net order value of cases with late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Invoices without po
metrics.description: Invoices without purchase order

metrics.name: Days Payables Outstanding
metrics.description: Days Payables Outstanding - Average time from invoice posting to invoice clearing within a reference period
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(${itp_clearing_date}) 
		WHERE ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${itp_invoice_clearing_period}))
	-(SELECT LAST(${itp_posting_date})
		WHERE ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${itp_invoice_posting_period})))

metrics.name: Cancellation rate of purchase orders_1
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with cancelled purchase order items
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT FIRST(event_name) FILTER (
			WHERE event_name IN (${po_item_cancellation_events}))) IS NOT NULL
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Volume of cancelled orders
metrics.description: Volume of orders in USD that have been cancelled

metrics.name: Invoices without goods receipt
metrics.description: Total number of invoices without goods receipts
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id)
	FILTER (WHERE NOT EVENT_NAME  MATCHES (${itp_goods_receipt_events})
		AND EVENT_NAME  MATCHES (${itp_invoice_posting_events}))

metrics.name: POs created after Invoice Receipt
metrics.description: Total number of cases in which a PO Item has been created after the Invoice Receipt event
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER
	(WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${po_created_after_invoice_receipt})))

metrics.name: Late deliveries rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Late payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with late payments. Only cases that are paid are considered.
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${late_payment_condition})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${invoice_clearing_date} IS NOT NULL)
	)
* 100

metrics.name: Overdue deliveries cases
metrics.description: Number of cases with overdue deliveries. Only cases that have not been (completely) delivered yet are considered.

metrics.name: Late payments cycle time
metrics.description: Average payment cycle time of cases with late payments
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER 
		(WHERE event_name IN (${invoice_clearing_events})))
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER 
    	(WHERE event_name IN (${invoice_receipt_events})))
	) FILTER (
	WHERE (${late_payment_condition})
	AND ${invoice_clearing_date} IS NOT NULL
	)

metrics.name: Process compliance
metrics.description: Percentage of compliant Procure-to-Pay cases
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ptp_compliant_event_sequence})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Two-way match rate
metrics.description: Percentage of purchase orders with a two-way match
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${two_way_match_condition})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Overdue payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with overdue payments. Only cases that have not been paid yet are considered.
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${overdue_payment_condition})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${invoice_clearing_date} IS NULL)
	)
* 100

metrics.name: Overdue deliveries net value
metrics.description: Net order value of cases with overdue deliveries. Only cases that have not been (completely) delivered yet are considered.

metrics.name: Average invoice payment time
metrics.description: Average time to clear invoices
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${invoice_clearing_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${invoice_receipt_events}))
   )

metrics.name: Late deliveries cases
metrics.description: Number of cases with late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Average delay of late deliveries
metrics.description: The average delay time of late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Overdue deliveries rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with overdue deliveries. Only cases that have not been (completely) delivered yet are considered.

metrics.name: PTP_DB_Average Confirmation Time for Purchase Requisitions
metrics.description: Average time needed to confirm a purchase requisition by creating a purchase order
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${po_creation_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${pr_creation_events}))
   )

metrics.name: Invoice reversal rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with reversed invoices
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${invoice_reversal_events})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${invoice_receipt_event_flow})
	)
* 100

metrics.name: Invoices waiting for Goods Receipt
metrics.description: Total number of cases with Invoices waiting for the Goods Receipt event
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES(${goods_receipt_events}))
	AND (event_name MATCHES(${invoice_receipt_event_flow}))
	)

metrics.name: PTP_DB_On-Time Delivery Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with on-time deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: PTP_DB_Average Processing Time for Purchase Orders
metrics.description: Average time from the creation of a purchase order to its acknowledgment
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${po_acknowledgement_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${po_creation_events}))
   )

metrics.name: Time savings due to automation
metrics.description: Difference between the average cycle time of automated and manual activities in the process
metrics.signalFragment:
(AVG((SELECT last(end_time)) - (SELECT first(end_time))) 
	FILTER (WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(${automation_condition}))))
-
(AVG((SELECT last(end_time)) - (SELECT first(end_time))) 
	FILTER (WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(${manual_condition}))))

metrics.name: Automation rate
metrics.description: Percentage of automated events
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(
	(SELECT COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE (${automation_condition}))
	)
   )
/ SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name)))
* 100

metrics.name: Percentage of cases with manual changes
metrics.description: Percentage of cases that contain change events executed manually
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name ${change_events}) 
    	AND BOOL_OR(${manual_changes_condition})))
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Percentage of cases with changes
metrics.description: Percentage of cases that contain change events
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name ${change_events})))
/
COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Automation rate potential
metrics.description: Percentage of events that could be automated
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(
	(SELECT COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE (${automation_potential_condition}))
	)
   )
/ SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name)))
* 100

metrics.name: PTP_DB_Average Cycle Time
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create FI Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create PO Item'))
   )
)
FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create PO Item' 'Create FI Invoice'))

metrics.name: Average cycle time of automated activities
metrics.description: Average cycle time of automated activities in the process
metrics.signalFragment:
(AVG((SELECT last(end_time)) - (SELECT first(end_time))) 
	FILTER (WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(${automation_condition}))))

metrics.name: Cases at compliance risk
metrics.description: Number of cases that might face penalty due to compliance violation

metrics.name: Average number of changes per case
metrics.description: Average number of change events per case
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE event_name ${change_events})))

metrics.name: Percentage of change events per case
metrics.description: Average percentage of change events per case

metrics.name: Percent of cases executed in less than a give time threshold
metrics.description: Percent of cases executed in less than a give time threshold

metrics.name: PTP_DB_Conformance Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases without conformance issues
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${conformance_condition})) 
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Clear Invoice'))
* 100

metrics.name: Non-conformant cases
metrics.description: Total number of non-conformant cases
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES(${conformance_condition})))

metrics.name: Average number of reworks per case
metrics.description: Average number, per case, of events that appear at least twice
metrics.signalFragment: AVG((SELECT COUNT(event_name) - COUNT(DISTINCT event_name)))

metrics.name: Number of SLA breaches based on SLA events - renaming test
metrics.description: Number of cases where the SLA was breached, based on events related to SLA breaches
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT FIRST(event_name) 
			WHERE event_name IN (${sla_breach_events})) IS NOT NULL)

metricVariables.name: itp_dunning_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice has been dunned, for example "Last Inv. Item Dunned On" IS NOT NULL

metricVariables.name: po_item_net_order_value
metricVariables.description: Attribute referring to the net order value of the PO Item, for example "PO Item Net Order Value in USD"
metricVariables.value: "PO Item Net Order Value in USD"

metricVariables.name: goods_receipt_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute referring to the date when the goods have been received, for example DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date")

metricVariables.name: po_item_cancellation_events
metricVariables.description: Events indicating that a purchase order item was cancelled, for example 'Delete PO Item'

metricVariables.name: late_delivery_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition identifying cases that are delivered too late, for example DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date") > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"
metricVariables.value: DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date") > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"

metricVariables.name: overdue_delivery_condition
metricVariables.description:
Condition identifying cases with an overdue delivery, for example DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"
	  AND "PO Item Delivery Completed" IS NULL
metricVariables.value: DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date" AND "PO Item Delivery Completed" IS NULL

metricVariables.name: po_created_after_invoice_receipt
metricVariables.description: Event flow indicating the creation of a PO Item after the Invoice has been received, for example ('Create FI Invoice'|'Record Invoice Receipt') ~> 'Create PO Item'
metricVariables.value: ('Create FI Invoice'|'Record Invoice Receipt') ~> 'Create PO Item'

metricVariables.name: po_change_event_flow
metricVariables.description: Events indicating changes to purchase order item, for example 'Update PO Item Net Price'

metricVariables.name: ptp_change_event_flow
metricVariables.description: Event flow indicating that change events happened in a case, for example ('Update PR Net Price'|'Send Purchase Order Update'|'Update PO Item Net Price'|'Update Invoice Payment Terms')
metricVariables.value: ('Update PR Net Price'|'Send Purchase Order Update'|'Update PO Item Net Price'|'Update Invoice Payment Terms')

metricVariables.name: mb_price_change_condition
metricVariables.description: Event flow indicating that price changes happened after the Goods Receipt event, for example 'Create Goods Receipt' ~> 'Update PO Item Net Price'
metricVariables.value: 'Create Goods Receipt' ~> 'Update PO Item Net Price'

metricVariables.name: two_way_match_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition identifying cases with a two-way attribute match, for example "PO Item Net Order Value" = "PO Item Total Invoiced Net Amount Document Curr."
metricVariables.value: "PO Item Net Order Value" = "PO Item Total Invoiced Net Amount Document Curr."

metricVariables.name: late_payment_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition that identifies cases with invoices paid late, for example "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date"
metricVariables.value: "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date"

metricVariables.name: po_acknowledgement_events
metricVariables.description: Events indicating the acknowledgement of a purchase order item, for example 'Receive Order Confirmation'

metricVariables.name: goods_receipt_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying the receipt of goods, for example 'Create Goods Receipt'

metricVariables.name: discount_applied_to_invoice
metricVariables.description: Attribute referring to the actual cash discount applied when the invoice was paid, for example "Last FI Invoice Cash Discount in USD"
metricVariables.value: "Last FI Invoice Cash Discount in USD"

metricVariables.name: total_invoice_amount
metricVariables.description: Attribute referring to the total amount of invoice items before any deductions, for example "PO Item Total Invoiced Net Amount in USD"
metricVariables.value: "PO Item Total Invoiced Net Amount in USD"

metricVariables.name: invoice_clearing_events
metricVariables.description: Events indicating the clearing of an invoice, for example 'Clear Invoice'

metricVariables.name: case_end_events
metricVariables.description: Events that identify when the case is completed, for example 'Incident Closed', 'Clear Invoice', 'Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Won'
metricVariables.value: 'Incident Closed', 'Clear Invoice', 'Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Won'

metricVariables.name: itp_amount_conv
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the amount (converted to USD) of an invoice, for example "Inv. Converted USD Amount"
metricVariables.value: "Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD"

metricVariables.name: start_events
metricVariables.description: Events defining the starting point of the process for the cycle time calculation, for example 'Create Sales Order Item'

metricVariables.name: invoice_receipt_event_flow
metricVariables.description: Event flow indicating the receipt of an invoice, for example ('Create FI Invoice'|'Record Invoice Receipt')

metricVariables.name: overdue_payment_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition that identifies cases with overdue invoices, for example "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
metricVariables.value: "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())

metricVariables.name: invoice_reversal_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying the reversal of an Invoice, for example 'Reverse Invoice'

metricVariables.name: delivery_completed_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition indicating that the delivery for a PO Item is completed, for example "PO Item Delivery Completed" = 'Yes'

metricVariables.name: itp_due_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the due date of an invoice, for example "Last Inv. Item Due Date"

metricVariables.name: automation_potential_condition
metricVariables.description: Attributes indicating that an event was not automated yet or should not be automated, for example "EventCreatedByUserType" = 'Dialog' AND (event_name <> 'Create Invoice Item')
metricVariables.value: "Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog' AND (event_name <> 'Create Invoice Item')

metricVariables.name: automation_condition
metricVariables.description: Attributes indicating that an event was automated, for example "EventCreatedByUserType" != 'Dialog'

metricVariables.name: goods_receipt_reversal_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying the reversal of a Goods Receipt, for example 'Reverse Goods Receipt'

metricVariables.name: sla_closure_events
metricVariables.description: Events defining the closing events of a case, for example 'Close Incident'

metricVariables.name: minimum_loops_condition
metricVariables.description: Minimum number of multiple occurrences for events to be considered as rework, for example: occurrence > 1

metricVariables.name: sla_creation_events
metricVariables.description: Events defining the start events of a case, for example 'Create Incident'

metricVariables.name: po_creation_events
metricVariables.description: Events indicating the creation of a purchase order, for example 'Create PO Item'

metricVariables.name: end_events
metricVariables.description: Events defining the end point of the process for the cycle time calculation, for example 'Post Goods Issue'

metricVariables.name: manual_changes_condition
metricVariables.description: Attributes indicating that an event was executed manually, for example "EventCreatedByUserType" = 'Dialog'

metricVariables.name: manual_condition
metricVariables.description: Attributes indicating that an event was executed manually, for example "EventCreatedByUserType" = 'Dialog'

metricVariables.name: discount_percentage
metricVariables.description: Attribute referring to the maximum percentage discount that can be applied to the total amount of an invoice item, for example "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Percentage 1"
metricVariables.value: "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Percentage 1"

metricVariables.name: payment_block_events
metricVariables.description: Events indicating that a payment block was set or removed, for example 'Remove Payment Block', 'Set Payment Block'

metricVariables.name: dropout_events
metricVariables.description: Events that identify a dropout case, for example 'Reject Quote', 'Update Opportunity Stage to: Dead - No Decision'
metricVariables.value: 'Reject Quote', 'Update Opportunity Stage to: Dead - No Decision'

metricVariables.name: closing_events
metricVariables.description: Events defining the closing of a case, for example 'Clear Invoice', 'Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Won', 'Reject Quote'
metricVariables.value: 'Clear Invoice', 'Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Won', 'Reject Quote'

metricVariables.name: delivery_due_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute referring to the date when the delivery is due, for example "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"

metricVariables.name: return_delivery_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying cases of delivery returns, for example 'Return Delivery via Delivery Note'

metricVariables.name: dropout_threshold_time
metricVariables.description: Time threshold for considering a case as idle, for example '21days'

metricVariables.name: compliance_start_events
metricVariables.description: Events defining the starting point of the process for the compliance check, for example 'Create Sales Order Item'

metricVariables.name: compliance_end_events
metricVariables.description: Events defining the end point of the process for the compliance check, for example 'Clear Invoice'

metricVariables.name: pr_creation_events
metricVariables.description: Events indicating the creation of a purchase requisition item, for example 'Create PR Item'

metricVariables.name: invoice_clearing_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute referring to the clearing date of an invoice, for example "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date"

metricVariables.name: change_events
metricVariables.description: Events referring to changes made to the case, for example 'Update PO Item PO Quantity', 'Update Opportunity Amount'

metricVariables.name: compliance_threshold_time
metricVariables.description: Threshold compliance time, for example '25 days'

metricVariables.name: threshold_cycle_time
metricVariables.description: Threshold cycle time, for example '4hours'

metricVariables.name: compliance_milestone_events
metricVariables.description: Events through which the case must flow in order to check for compliance, for example 'Post Goods Issue'

metricVariables.name: sla_breach_events
metricVariables.description: Events indicating the breach of an SLA, for example 'Incident Resolution SLA Breached'

metricVariables.name: target_sla_time
metricVariables.description: SLA time expectation, for example '15 days'

metricVariables.name: ptp_compliant_event_sequence
metricVariables.description: Sequence of events that fulfil the compliance requirements of a Procure-to-Pay process, for example ^ 'Create PO Item' ~> 'Create Goods Receipt' ~> ('Create FI Invoice'|'Record Invoice Receipt') ~> 'Clear Invoice' $
metricVariables.value: ^ 'Create PO Item' ~> 'Create Goods Receipt' ~> ('Create FI Invoice'|'Record Invoice Receipt') ~> 'Clear Invoice' $

metricVariables.name: invoice_receipt_events
metricVariables.description: Events indicating the receipt of an invoice, for example 'Record Invoice Receipt', 'Create FI Invoice'

metricVariables.name: ptp_compliant_event_sequence_1
metricVariables.description: Sequence of events that fulfil the compliance requirements of a Procure-to-Pay process, for example ^ 'Create PO Item' ~> 'Create Goods Receipt' ~> ('Create FI Invoice'|'Record Invoice Receipt') ~> 'Clear Invoice' $
metricVariables.value: ^ 'Create PR Item' ~> 'Release PR Item' ~> 'Create PO Item'  ~> 'Block PO' ~> 'Release PO' ~> ('Receive Order Confirmation'|'Receive Advanced Shipment Notice (ASN)') ~> 'Create Goods Receipt' ~> 'Make Quality Usage Decision' ~> ('Create FI Invoice'|'Record Invoice Receipt')  ~> 'Clear Invoice'

metricVariables.name: itp_po_creation_to_invoice_posting
metricVariables.description: Purchase order creation followed directly or indirectly by invoice posting, for example 'Create Purchase Order'~> 'Post Invoice'

metricVariables.name: itp_invoice_posting_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying the posting of invoice items, for example 'Post Invoice'

metricVariables.name: po_change_event_flow_1
metricVariables.description: Events indicating changes to purchase order item, for example 'Update PO Item Net Price'
metricVariables.value: ('Update PO Item Quantity' | 'Update PO Item Plant' | 'Update PO Item Net Price' | 'Update PO Item Material')

metricVariables.name: itp_goods_receipt_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying that the goods have been shipped, for example 'Record Goods Issue'

metricVariables.name: itp_invoice_clearing_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor invoice creation to clearing times within, for example the last year: '52weeks'

metricVariables.name: itc_due_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the due date of an invoice, for example "Last Inv. Item Due Date"

metricVariables.name: po_creation_events_1
metricVariables.description: Events indicating the creation of a purchase order, for example 'Create PO Item'

metricVariables.name: itc_early_payment_condition
metricVariables.description: Number of days an invoice clearing is considered to be too early

metricVariables.name: itc_late_payment_condition
metricVariables.description: Number of days an invoice clearing is considered to be too late

metricVariables.name: itp_invoice_posting_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor clearing of invoices within, for example the last year: '52weeks'

metricVariables.name: otc_change_events
metricVariables.description: Events referring to changes made to the sales doc item, for example: 'Change Sales Doc Item Price'
metricVariables.value: 'Update PR Quantity', 'Update PR Net Price', 'Update PR Material', 'Update PR Delivery Date', 'Update PO Vendor', 'Update PO Payment Terms', 'Update PO Item Quantity', 'Update PO Item Plant', 'Update PO Item Net Price', 'Update PO Item Material', 'Update PO Currency', 'Update PO Confirmed Delivery Date', 'Update Order Confirmation', 'Update Contract Target Quantity', 'Update Contract Net Price', 'Reverse Invoice', 'Reverse Goods Receipt', 'Reopen PR', 'Reactivate PR Item', 'Reactivate PO Item', 'Delete PR Item', 'Delete PO Item', 'Delete Contract Item'

metricVariables.name: itp_posting_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the posting date of an invoice, for example "Inv. Posting Document Date"

metricVariables.name: itp_late_payment_condition
metricVariables.description: Number of days an invoice clearing is considered to be too late, for example '1days'

metricVariables.name: itp_cd_2_missed
metricVariables.description: Order of events identifying that an invoice was paid after the cash discount due date 2, for example 'Cash Discount 2 Due Date passed'~>'Clear Invoice'

metricVariables.name: itp_clear_invoice_events
metricVariables.description: Event identifying the clearing of an invoice, for example 'Clear Invoice'

metricVariables.name: itp_early_payment_condition
metricVariables.description: Number of days an invoice clearing is considered to be too early, for example '5days'

metricVariables.name: itp_discount_applied_to_invoice
metricVariables.description: Attribute referring to the actual cash discount applied when the invoice was paid, for example "Inv. Converted USD Cash Discount Amount"

metricVariables.name: itp_remove_payment_block_events
metricVariables.description: Event identifying the removal of a payment block for an invoice, for example 'Remove Payment Block'

metricVariables.name: itp_discount_percentage
metricVariables.description: Attribute referring to the maximum percentage discount that can be applied to the total amount of an invoice item, for example "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1"

metricVariables.name: itp_clearing_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the clearing date of an invoice, for example "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"

metricVariables.name: itp_set_payment_block_events
metricVariables.description: Event identifying the setting of a payment block for an invoice, for example 'Set Payment Block'

metricVariables.name: ontime_delivery_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition defining that a delivery is on time, for example "DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime" = 'Yes'

metricVariables.name: itp_cd_1_missed
metricVariables.description: Order of events identifying that an invoice was paid after the cash discount due date 1, for example 'Cash Discount 1 Due Date passed'~>'Clear Invoice'

metricVariables.name: itp_cd_in_time
metricVariables.description: Order of events identifying that an invoice was paid in time for collection of cash discount 1, for example 'Clear Invoice'~>('Cash Discount 1 Due Date passed'|'Cash Discount 2 Due Date passed')
metricVariables.value: 'Clear Invoice'~>('Cash Discount 1 Due Date passed'|'Cash Discount 2 Due Date passed')

metricVariables.name: conformance_condition
metricVariables.description: Sequence of events that describes the "to-be" process, for example, using the MATCHES function syntax ^ 'Create Sales Order Item' ~> 'Create Outbound Delivery Item' ~> 'Clear Invoice' $
metricVariables.value:
'Create PO Item'
	~> 'Release PO'
	~> 'Create Goods Receipt'
	~> ('Record Invoice Receipt'|'Create FI Invoice')
	~> 'Clear Invoice'

metricVariables.name: itp_automatic_condition_nested
metricVariables.description: Condition indicating that an event was manual, for example "Event Created By User Type" MATCHES('Dialog')

metricVariables.name: itp_automation_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition indicating that an event was automated, for example "Event Created By User Type" <> 'Dialog'

metricVariables.name: automation_condition_1
metricVariables.description: Attributes indicating that an event was automated, for example "EventCreatedByUserType" != 'Dialog'

metricVariables.name: itc_clear_invoice_events
metricVariables.description: Event identifying the clearing of an invoice, for example 'Clear Invoice'

metricVariables.name: itc_remove_dunning_block_events
metricVariables.description: Event identifying the removal of a dunning block for an invoice, for example 'Remove Dunning Block'

metricVariables.name: itc_no_touch_condition
metricVariables.description: Events that need manual intervention on an invoice and contradict the no-touch rate
metricVariables.value: ('Remove Dunning Block'|'Set Dunning Block'|'Change Dunning Block'|'Send 1st Overdue Notice'|'Update Baseline Date'|'Update Payment Term'|'Reverse Invoice')

metricVariables.name: itc_posting_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the posting date of an invoice, for example "Inv. Posting Document Date"

metricVariables.name: itc_dunning_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice has already been dunned, for example "InvoiceLastDunnedOn" IS NOT NULL
metricVariables.value: "Last Inv. Item Dunned On" IS NOT NULL

metricVariables.name: itc_set_dunning_block_events
metricVariables.description: Event identifying the setting of a dunning block for an invoice, for example 'Set Dunning Block'

metricVariables.name: itc_shipping_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying that the goods have been shipped, for example 'Record Goods Issue'

metricVariables.name: itc_amount_conv
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the amount (converted to USD) of an invoice, for example "Inv. Converted USD Amount"

metricVariables.name: itc_posting_to_baseline_update_events
metricVariables.description: Invoice Posting to Baseline date changes event flow

metricVariables.name: itc_clearing_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the clearing date of an invoice, for example "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"

metricVariables.name: itc_billing_doc_to_invoice_events
metricVariables.description: Billing Document to Invoice event flow

metricVariables.name: itc_invoice_reversal_events
metricVariables.description: Event identifying the reversal of an invoice, for example 'Reverse Invoice'

metricVariables.name: itc_automation_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition indicating that an event was automated, for example "Event Created By User Type" <> 'Dialog'

metricVariables.name: itc_invoice_creation_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying the creation of invoice items, for example 'Create Invoice'

metricVariables.name: itc_change_baseline_date
metricVariables.description: Events that describe a change in baseline date, for example 'Update Baseline Date'

metricVariables.name: itc_invoice_clearing_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor invoice creation to clearing times within, for example the last 60 weeks: '60weeks'

metricVariables.name: itc_invoice_posting_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor clearing of invoices within, for example the last 60 weeks: '60weeks'

metricVariables.name: itp_cash_discount_terms
metricVariables.description: Terms that determine after which time an invoice needs to be paid, for example "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" BSEG.ZBD1t
metricVariables.value: "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1"

metricVariables.name: itp_purchase_order_payment_terms
metricVariables.description: Attribute referring to the purchase order payment terms in days, for example "PO Net Payment Days"

metricVariables.name: itp_invoice_payment_terms
metricVariables.description: Attribute referring to the invoice payment terms in days, for example "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"
metricVariables.value: "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1"
